text: Ani janasamuhacya saradaranni uttara dile, je kupra (inkara) karita asata ani akhiratacya bhetisa khote tharavita asata ani amhi tyanna aihika jivanata sukhi thevale hote, mhanu lagale, ha tara tumacyasarakhaca eka manusya ahe. Je tumhi khata teca to khato ani je pani tumhi pita, teca to dekhila pito
